title: Introducing: Goldmyth
body:
Very into this swirling, gorgeously textured debut EP from Utah’s **Goldmyth**.

Intimate songwriting merges seamlessly with flawless production, even ambitiously bringing a harp into the mix, Faded Dream is packed with ideas and potential. From the out and out pop of _Lover’s Letdown_ to the almost Bibio-esque self-titled closer, this is truly the sign of an artist with limitless imagination. Check out a couple of highlights from the EP below.
